short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We don't say his name, and sometimes you won't have to see it!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get tired of seeing a certain person's name in the media all the time? Just add this extension to Chrome and there is a high chance that he-who-must-not-be-named will not be named. 60% of the time it works every time!
